item.title: Reply Guy
item.description: A great term I heard for the first time today: A reply guy is a term for a man who frequently comments on tweets or other social media posts in an annoying, condescending, forward, or otherwise unsolicited mannerâ€“especially posts by women. Dictionary.com

item.title: Basic necessities
item.description: As the Government and corporations make decisions on our behalf about what constitute basic necessities, Jo Glanville makes the point that â€˜Essential items are not only the goods that keep us alive, but the ones that make us human.â€™ Jo Glanville | Basic Necessities Â· LRB 8 April 2020

item.title: This was Nixon
item.description: This was Nixon. Imagine a president being so vain and childish. The president wanted to reimpose a ban on New York Times reporters entering the White House â€“ the paper hadnâ€™t given him enough praise for his role in the Apollo programme. The Most Beautiful Icicle: Apollo 11
